subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: A controversial penalty handed host Juventus a 1-0 win over Monaco. Atlético Madrid held Real Madrid to a 0-0 draw in the first leg of their quarterfinal.
snippet: A controversial penalty handed host Juventus a 1-0 win over Monaco. Atlético Madrid held Real Madrid to a 0-0 draw in the first leg of their quarterfinal.
